# IDropdownItem Interface

Properties of dropdown property item children

## Properties

### **label**
`read-only label: string;`

Localized display text of the dropdown item.

Type: *string*

### **value**
`read-only value: number;`

The selectable value of the dropdown item.

Type: *number*
